name: Bokujou Monogatari: Futago no Mura+
storyline: There are "Two villages" where you can choose living in whichever you like. The "Blue Bell Village" composed of many animals. There are various crops growing, "Hana Nakamura". A fun ranch life in my favorite village! A girl hero can be chosen as well. According to the village where you live, there are many fashionable things too! Let's join the festival Let's participate in festivals such as cooking showdown and fishing competitions!
summary: Bokujou Monogatari: Futago no Mura+ is a Japanese-exclusive Enhanced port of Harvest Moon: The Tale of Two Towns.
